## Figure S1 code

### Import

```{r, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}

# get Figure S1
final_plot = ggplot2::ggplot() + ggplot2::annotation_custom(
  grid::rasterGrob(
    magick::image_read("data/p02-07/Figure_S1.png"),
    width = ggplot2::unit(1, "npc"),
    height = ggplot2::unit(1, "npc")),
  -Inf, Inf, -Inf, Inf)

```
